ssot__DataUsePurposeConsentAction__dlm.name: Data Use Purpose Consent Action
ssot__DataUsePurposeConsentAction__dlm.description: The Data Use Purpose Consent Action DMO represents an individual's consent preferences for consent actions.

ssot__ConsentActionId__c.description: A reference ID to user permission regarding how their personal data is shared, for example data collection (of events), tracking (of web and email activity), and sharing data with third parties.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Data Use Purpose Consent Action DMO.

ssot__DataUsePurposeId__c.description: A reference ID to reason for contacting a prospect or customer, for example billing, marketing, or surveys.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.
